scripts.CreneauxProd: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest files/prod --target lib --name mylittlePressingCreneaux 'src/app_main.js'
scripts.CreneauxDev: vue-cli-service build --mode development --dest files/Dev --target lib --name AppCreneaux 'src/app_main.js'
scripts.CreneauxConfigsDev: vue-cli-service build --mode development --dest files/AppAll --target lib --name AppAllCreneaux 'src/main.js'
scripts.CreneauxConfigsProd: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest files/AppAll --target lib --name AppAllCreneaux 'src/main.js'
